alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 5:28PM CDT until May 10 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of White Deer to 6 miles south of Lefors, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pampa, Canadian, Miami, White Deer, Lefors, Skellytown, New Mobeetie, Glazier, Kellerville, Lora, Kingsmill, Codman, Lake Marvin and Mobeetie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Gray; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts; Wheeler
